name: Pinboy
description:
an RPG+ pinball game

This time, the ball in the pinball game becomes an adventurer. You will go to the Ludum Dare Kingdom. During the journey, you will complete some missions, to find the way to the castle, defeat the evil witch and save the princess...

*new version v2.0
-add new animation for the ball when taken damage
-add new animation for the ball when reborn
-add new animation for the witch when casting spells
-add new animation in the stage when you get items
-fix the graphic bugs about the pedals
-re-design the position of the knights
-now all the knights will appear to protect the witch at the beginning
Thank you for your playing.
